hero.title: The onRuntime Studio Association
hero.description: A French non-profit organization dedicated to innovation and creativity in web development, mobile development, and design.

history.title: Our story
history.description: Founded in 2020, onRuntime Studio was born from the shared passion of developers and designers who have been collaborating since 2015. Our organization aims to create a collaborative space to innovate and share our knowledge, with the ambition to soon become a full-fledged company.

2015.title: First collaborations
2015.description: Beginning of collaborations between Jérémy, Antoine, and Lucas, mainly on video game platforms.

2020.title: Creation of the organization
2020.description: Official founding of onRuntime Studio as a French non-profit organization, on the advice of Bryan Recher.

2021.title: Meeting in Rouen
2021.description: The founders meet in Rouen to accelerate projects, particularly their flagship project: Tonight Pass.

2022.title: First recruitments
2022.description: The organization recruits its first employees to support the development of its projects.

2023-2025.title: Continued expansion
2023-2025.description: Focus on developing Tonight Pass and preparing for a future transformation into a company.

founders.title: The founders
founders.description: Our organization was founded by three enthusiasts who have been working together for several years to bring innovative projects to life.

values.title: Our values
values.description: These fundamental principles guide our approach and vision, influencing each of our actions and decisions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of creativity and technology to offer innovative solutions.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in the strength of the collective and foster a collaborative environment where everyone can thrive.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Every project is approached with passion and dedication, because we deeply love what we do.

learning.title: Learning
learning.description: We value continuous learning and knowledge sharing to progress together.

expertise.title: Our technical expertise
expertise.description: The technologies we master and use in our association projects.

membership.title: Become a member
membership.description: Join our community of enthusiasts and participate in the development of innovative projects.

annual.title: Annual membership
annual.description: Annual fee to become a volunteer member of the organization.

benefits.hours: Commitment of 3 to 6 hours per week
benefits.discord: Dedicated Discord role and access to private channels
benefits.mentoring: Personalized mentoring by our experienced members
benefits.resources: Access to all our resources and training

initiatives.title: Our programs and initiatives
initiatives.description: Discover the initiatives we are currently developing and our upcoming projects.

mentoring.title: Technical mentoring program
mentoring.description: Our mentoring program allows beginner members to be accompanied in their skill development by experienced developers and designers from the organization.

workshops.title: Collaborative technical workshops
workshops.description: Group work and learning sessions on specific technologies, organized online and in-person when possible.

hackathons.title: Community hackathons
hackathons.description: Organization of 48-hour events where teams will develop innovative solutions together on specific issues.

initiatives.contribute: Would you like to contribute to the development of these initiatives?

discord.title: Join our Discord community
discord.description: Connect with other members, participate in technical discussions, and stay informed about the latest news from the organization.
